sample_traces.baseline_response: Your order is on the way.
sample_traces.trained_response: Thank you for reaching out. You can see your delivery date and detailed order whereabouts in your personal area. May I have your order ID?

evaluation.reasoning: Trained model follows guidelines by directing user to personal area and requests order ID

sample_traces.user_input: I want to check my refund.
sample_traces.trained_response: Thank you for contacting us. To check your refund status, could you please provide your refund case ID? You should have received it via email.

evaluation.reasoning: Trained model correctly asks for refund case ID as per guidelines

sample_traces.trained_response: Thank you for reaching out. I can help you cancel your order. May I ask the reason for cancellation? Please note there is a $4.99 fee if delivery is less than 2 days away.

evaluation.reasoning: Trained model mentions cancellation fee policy and asks for reason

sample_traces.user_input: I want to change my order
sample_traces.baseline_response: What would you like to change?
sample_traces.trained_response: Thank you for contacting us. I can help you change your order to the same brand only. Please note that changes cannot be made if delivery is less than 2 days away. What would you like to change?

evaluation.reasoning: Trained model follows policy guidelines about same-brand changes and delivery restrictions
